page.title: 07School Meals
page.content: The cooks enjoy preparing the puddings as people like them so much.They order and plan the dinners a week in advance so that they are well arranged. After interviewing the children we found that out of a class of 35,only 9 liked dinners best.Most people think that the dinners are cheap,at 64p a day.Milk is very popular with almost everyone.{This is an example of 2 days {choice of menu. {Mon:}fishcake/luncheon meat,chips and baked beans.Coconut tart and custard/ Angel Whirl. {Tues:}Roast pork,cabbage,potatoes, gravy,apple sauce.Australian Crunch, custard,yogurt. This is what people have for packed lunch. Sandwiches/rolls,fruit,cake/biscuits, yogurt,crisps.(In sandwiches)cheese, ham,pate,chicken and banana.
